tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had a good experience at Dr Anju Ahuj clinic. ***** **** ***** * ************* *** experience in her field she is a great human being.
She is very sympthetic and has lots of patience in understanding your problem. The best part was her non-judgemental nature.
 
I highly recommend all my relatives and friends to visit if they have any gynaec related problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Anju Ahuja is a very polite, friendly and a pleasing personality. She patiently listens to your problems and concerns and gives her experienced advise and feedback.
Going to her not only helped me improve my medical condition but her counseling also helped me approach the problem more positively.
I would recommend going to her for your gynaec treatment as there is a very positive environment in her clinic. She is always approachable on phone too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My wife started visiting the doctor from October 2018 to July 2019 until her delivery. Trust me it was an amazing care which was taken by the doctor.

She is patience, courteous, *************, humble and most of all a good human being. She never made her feel like she is the doctor and my wife is a patient, instead it was more of a mother daughter relationship.

Thank you Doctor Anju Ahuja for making this entire stint worth remembering.

Appreciate you for all that you did for us.
reply_text: Thank you so much ,Nikhil and Deepika. It's been a wonderful experience with you guys .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is calm, professional, and knowledgeable. Very non-judgmental and patient, whatever your problem may be. Her medical advice is also sound, so overall a very pleasant and effective experience. Have also recommended her to others and always received only positive feedback. Good to have such a dependable doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
The doctor was unprofessionally judgmental. She was non-empathetic and assumed about my lifestyle or actions by asking few basic questions. She gave good treatment advice, but for an anxious patient she was not very professional in her approach of being sensitive to a patient. 

This is the first step of healing a doctor can do with a patient, by being humble and sensitive. I would request her to be sensitive to patients. Not sure if I would go again, for her professional advice was sound, but professional attitude to patient wasn't.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went for the treatment of PCOD and high-risk pregnancy. I had the problem of the low lying placenta that required a lot of care and precautions. Dr.Anju took very good care of me. She prescribed bed rest and avoiding laborious work especially weight lifting. I was hospitalized a couple of times in the 3rd and 7th  month and both the times she thoroughly investigated. My pregnancy was full of problems but she handled very carefully. She is a very caring, sincere, polite and gentle doctor. I and my whole family are very thankful to her.

tags: None
review:
Dr.Ahuja patiently listened to our problems.
She explained in detail the reasons for why this is happening. She removed all our apprehensions. She was unhurried in her dealing which sadly was lacking in our previous doctor.She was very friendly but professional in her approach.
We are going for revisit after one week of treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: It's a good experience overall. The doctor spent good time understanding issues and then suggesting the treatment

tags: None
review:
Ahuja mam is so polite and she takes very ample time to give advise to the patient.
She is quite experience and in the first visit,we were completely satisfied.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been visiting Dr Anju Ahuja in Ahuja clinic for last 4-5 months. She listened to my all problems patiently and explained everything in detail.  I am satisfied with her treatment. She is good and experienced doctor.
